title: Operational ANS Performance with R
text: Workspace development GANP/PBWG/BRA-EUR/CHN-EUR informed package. general objective air navigation services enable “… safe, efficient, orderly flow air traffic.” ICAO promotes use performance-based approach encourages stakeholder monitor benchmark services. purpose set (global) key performance indicators (KPI) established Global Air Navigation Plan. KPIs (variants ) actively used performance benchmarking community. package jointly developed Department Airspace Control (DECEA) und EUROCONTROL. Performance groups organisations committed harmonise use KPIs part bi-lateral multi-lateral/international work. ansperf package implements common KPIs supporting metrics R.

title: Operational ANS Performance with R
text: performance framework GANP lists following KPIs (c.f. https://www4.icao.int/ganpportal/ASBU/KPI) whether ansperf implemented: ```{r, echo=FALSE} load(“./data/data_ganp_kpi_reqs.rda”) gt::gt(data_ganp_kpi_reqs) |> gt::sub_missing(missing_text = ““)
